name: D-Day: America Invades
overview: Strategic wargame set in the campaign of the American VII corps on the Cotentin peninsula....well, D-Day. Spiritual successor to V for Victory: Utah Beach. You can play in either the allied or german side as you play on a series of pre-made scenarios or full campaign mode using the Avalon Hill's Worlds at War rules and game mechanics. Also included are a series of historical variants which can be turned on or off for each scenario.
